tasks.title: Design database schema for users and roles
tasks.description: Create database tables for users, roles, permissions, and user sessions. Include fields for email, hashed password, role assignments, and session tokens.

tasks.title: Implement user registration API endpoint
tasks.description: Create POST /api/auth/register endpoint with email validation, password strength checking, and user creation. Hash passwords using bcrypt.

tasks.title: Implement login API endpoint
tasks.description: Create POST /api/auth/login endpoint with credential validation, session token generation (JWT), and failed attempt tracking.

tasks.title: Implement password reset functionality
tasks.description: Create endpoints for password reset request and password reset confirmation. Send reset email with secure token. Token should expire after 1 hour.

tasks.title: Implement role-based access control middleware
tasks.description: Create middleware to check user roles and permissions for protected routes. Implement decorators/guards for role checking.

tasks.title: Create login/register UI components
tasks.description: Build React components for login form, registration form, and password reset form with validation and error handling.

tasks.title: Write unit tests for authentication
tasks.description: Create comprehensive unit tests for all authentication endpoints and middleware using Jest/Mocha. Cover success and failure scenarios.

tasks.title: Design order and cart database schema
tasks.description: Create tables for orders, order_items, shopping_cart, and cart_items. Include relationships and indexes for performance.

tasks.title: Implement product browsing API
tasks.description: Create GET /api/products endpoint with pagination, filtering, and search capabilities. Include product images and details.

tasks.title: Implement shopping cart API
tasks.description: Create CRUD endpoints for shopping cart: add item, update quantity, remove item, get cart. Support guest and authenticated users.

tasks.title: Implement order creation API
tasks.description: Create POST /api/orders endpoint to convert cart to order. Validate inventory, calculate totals, apply discounts, and save order.

tasks.title: Implement order confirmation email
tasks.description: Set up email service to send order confirmation with order details, items, and tracking information. Use email template.

tasks.title: Create product catalog UI
tasks.description: Build product listing page with grid/list view, filters, search, and pagination. Make it responsive and user-friendly.

tasks.title: Create shopping cart UI
tasks.description: Build shopping cart page showing items, quantities, prices, and total. Allow quantity updates and item removal.

tasks.title: Create checkout and order review UI
tasks.description: Build checkout flow with order summary, payment information form, and order submission. Show loading and success states.

tasks.title: Write tests for order creation flow
tasks.description: Create unit and integration tests for cart operations and order creation. Test validation, error handling, and edge cases.

tasks.title: Implement order listing API
tasks.description: Create GET /api/orders endpoint for users to retrieve their orders with pagination, filtering by status, and date range.

tasks.title: Implement order details API
tasks.description: Create GET /api/orders/:id endpoint to retrieve full order details including items, status history, and tracking information.

tasks.title: Implement order status tracking system
tasks.description: Create system to track order status changes with timestamps and history. Store status transitions in database.

tasks.title: Implement status change notifications
tasks.description: Set up email notifications to be sent when order status changes. Use email templates for each status type.

tasks.title: Create order history UI
tasks.description: Build order list page showing user's orders with status badges, dates, and totals. Include filters and search.

tasks.title: Create order details UI
tasks.description: Build order details page showing full order information, items, status timeline, and tracking link. Make it printable.

tasks.title: Write tests for order tracking
tasks.description: Create tests for order retrieval, filtering, and status updates. Test notification delivery.

tasks.title: Implement admin order listing API
tasks.description: Create GET /api/admin/orders endpoint with advanced filtering, sorting, and search across all orders. Include pagination.

tasks.title: Implement order status update API
tasks.description: Create PATCH /api/admin/orders/:id/status endpoint for admins to update order status with notes and timestamps.

tasks.title: Implement order cancellation and refund API
tasks.description: Create POST /api/admin/orders/:id/cancel endpoint with refund processing logic and inventory restoration.

tasks.title: Implement order reporting API
tasks.description: Create endpoints for generating reports: daily/weekly/monthly sales, top products, customer analytics. Support export formats.

tasks.title: Implement real-time order notifications
tasks.description: Set up WebSocket or SSE for real-time notifications to admins when new orders arrive. Include desktop notifications.

tasks.title: Create admin dashboard UI
tasks.description: Build dashboard showing key metrics: total orders, revenue, pending orders, recent orders. Include charts and graphs.

tasks.title: Create admin order management UI
tasks.description: Build admin order list with advanced filters, batch actions, and quick status updates. Include export functionality.

tasks.title: Create reporting UI
tasks.description: Build reporting interface with date range selection, report type selection, and data visualization. Allow export to CSV/Excel.

tasks.title: Write tests for admin functionality
tasks.description: Create comprehensive tests for admin endpoints, authorization checks, and reporting logic.

tasks.title: Design product database schema
tasks.description: Create tables for products, product_images, categories, product_variants, and inventory. Include proper indexes.

tasks.title: Implement product CRUD API
tasks.description: Create endpoints for creating, reading, updating, and deleting products. Include validation and error handling.

tasks.title: Implement product image upload
tasks.description: Create image upload endpoint with validation, resizing, and storage (local or cloud). Support multiple images per product.

tasks.title: Implement category management API
tasks.description: Create endpoints for managing product categories and subcategories with hierarchical structure.

tasks.title: Implement inventory management API
tasks.description: Create endpoints for managing product inventory, stock levels, and availability. Include low stock alerts.

tasks.title: Create product management UI
tasks.description: Build admin interface for adding/editing products with form validation, image upload, and rich text editor for descriptions.

tasks.title: Create category management UI
tasks.description: Build interface for managing categories with drag-and-drop ordering and hierarchical tree view.

tasks.title: Create inventory management UI
tasks.description: Build interface for managing inventory with bulk updates, low stock warnings, and inventory history.

tasks.title: Write tests for product management
tasks.description: Create tests for product CRUD operations, image upload, category management, and inventory tracking.
